Package sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan

Class LeaverPlanBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.BasePlanBuilder
      • sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.LeaverPlanBuilder
  • public class LeaverPlanBuilder
extends BasePlanBuilder
    Useful Leaver Plan Builder for building plan and deferred plans, adding and processing Applications.

      • getAppRequests

        public sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.ConfiguredLeaverRequest getAppRequests​(SailPointContext context,
                                                                        java.lang.String identityName,
                                                                        java.lang.String appName,
                                                                        java.lang.String mode,
                                                                        java.lang.String nativeID)
                                                                 throws GeneralException
        Method used for getting ConfiguredLeaverRequest for given appName and nativeID
        Parameters:
        context - SailPointContext that provides an API to access persistence store and core system operations
        identityName - the name of identity to lookup from context.
        appName - the application to create a bare account on.
        mode - String representation of mode, e.g. "deleteAccount", "later", "removeEntitlement" or "addComment".
        nativeID - provided to select needed application link.
        Returns:
        configured ConfiguredLeaverRequest for provided identity application which name matches given appName, otherwise the new instance will be returned with existing ConfiguredLeaverRequest
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • processApps

        protected void processApps​(java.lang.String mode,
                           Identity identity,
                           sailpoint.rapidsetup.plan.LeaverPlanBuilder.LinkAction linkAction)
                    throws GeneralException
        Method used for processing applications for specified Identity in given mode.
        Parameters:
        mode - String representation of mode, e.g. "deleteAccount", "later", "removeEntitlement" or "addComment".
        identity - Identity to iterate its applications
        linkAction - link action to which requests need to be added.
        Throws:
        GeneralException
